com.github.cjengineer18.desktopwindowtemplate.util.async

Class AsyncTask<Input,Output>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cjengineer18.desktopwindowtemplate.util.async.AsyncTask<Input,Output>
  • Type Parameters:
    Input - The argument's class.
    Output - The result's class.

    public abstract class AsyncTask<Input,Output>
extends Object
    An utility method for async tasks. This class support arguments and can return a result. A dialog appears to show the progress. This class uses a SwingWorker for execution.
    Author:
    Cristian Jimenez
    See Also:
    SwingWorker

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncTask

        public AsyncTask(Window parent)
        Creates a new async task. With this constructor you can create indeterminate progress task. Note what this version of AsyncTask still be return something, otherwise you must use AsyncProcessLoading.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        See Also:
        AsyncProcessLoading

      • AsyncTask

        public AsyncTask(Window parent,
                 int step)
        Creates a new async task.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        step - The progress step.

      • AsyncTask

        public AsyncTask(Window parent,
                 String title,
                 int step,
                 boolean indeterminate,
                 boolean enableCancel)
        Creates a new async task.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        title - A title for the dialog title.
        step - The progress step.
        indeterminate - If true, disables progress monitoring.
        enableCancel - If this process can be cancelled.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        @SafeVarargs
public final void execute(Input... inputs)
        Executes the process, passing the arguments if required. Unlike SwingWorker.execute(), this method can be used many times.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The arguments
        See Also:
        SwingWorker.execute()

      • get

        public final Output get()
                 throws InterruptedException,
                        ExecutionException
        Calls the SwingWorker.get() to get the result of the process, or return it immediately if this task has been executed successfully. Return null if the task has cancelled. You must call execute() before call this.
        Returns:
        The task's result.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
        See Also:
        SwingWorker.get(), execute(Object...)

      • get

        public final Output get(long timeout,
                        TimeUnit unit)
                 throws InterruptedException,
                        ExecutionException,
                        TimeoutException
        Calls the SwingWorker.get(long, TimeUnit) to get the result of the process, or return it immediately if this task has been executed successfully. Return null if the task has cancelled. You must call execute() before call this.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The time to wait.
        unit - The time unit.
        Returns:
        The task's result.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
        TimeoutException
        See Also:
        SwingWorker.get(long, TimeUnit), execute(Object...)

      • isDone

        public final boolean isDone()
        Checks if the task is done.
        Returns:
        true if the task is done.

      • isCancelled

        public final boolean isCancelled()
        Checks if the task is cancelled.
        Returns:
        true if the task is cancelled.

      • getParent

        protected final Window getParent()
        Get the window parent
        Returns:
        The parent.

      • addStep

        protected final void addStep()
        Adds the step as progress.

      • addDelta

        protected final void addDelta(int delta)
        Adds a progress delta.
        Parameters:
        delta - The progress change.

      • updateMessage

        protected final void updateMessage(String message)
        Updates the dialog's message.
        Parameters:
        message - The new message.

      • done

        protected void done(Output output)
        This method is called when doInBackground(Input[]) finish. Process the output result in the main thread.
        Parameters:
        output - The task's result.
        See Also:
        doInBackground(Object[])

      • doInBackground

        protected abstract Output doInBackground(Input[] inputs)
                                  throws Exception
        The task to execute in an async thread. Returns a result or throws an exception. Unlike SwingWorker.doInBackground(), multiple calls of execute() invokes doInBackground(Input[]) multiple times.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The parameters from execute(Input...).
        Returns:
        A result.
        Throws:
        Exception - If any error.
        See Also:
        SwingWorker.doInBackground(), execute(Object...), done(Object)
